verses.verse: וּמִקְנֶ֣ה׀ <WH4735> u-mik-Neh of cattle רַ֗ב <WH7227> Rav, multitude הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had לִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> liv-Nei Now the children רְאוּבֵ֛ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben וְלִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-liv-nei- and the children גָ֖ד <WH1410> gad of Gad עָצ֣וּם <WH6099> 'a-Tzum great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; had a very וַיִּרְא֞וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U and when they saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land יַעְזֵר֙ <WH3270> ya'-Zer of Jazer וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz and the land גִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad, of Gilead וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh indeed הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom that behold the place מְק֥וֹם <WH4725> me-Kom [was] a place מִקְנֶֽה׃ <WH4735> mik-Neh. for cattle
